inclusion.criterion: Confirmed advanced cirrhosis of any aetiology with a MELD score between 10 and 16.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of liver cirrhosis will be based on clinical, radiological, or histological criteria.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with alcohol-related liver disease must have been abstinent from alcohol for a minimum of 6 weeks.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be deemed to have capacity to consent to study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients treated for active variceal bleeding, infection, bacterial peritonitis, overt hepatic encephalopathy or acute-on-chronic liver failure within the past 14 days.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have received antibiotics in the past 14 days.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has had a previous liver transplant
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatocellular carcinoma outside of the Milan Criteria (2)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: A history of prior gastrointestinal resection such as gastric bypass
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has advanced cirrhosis, recent UGIB, and new slurred speech and tangential thought process. Patient is off ETOH for a year.
